register.name: SPA_SW_RESET_REG
register.description:
It may influence all SoC operation to use SW Reset duing SPA processing. So, please use carefully when using reset control.
SW Reset Use Guide 1: Set DMA_RESET 2: Check DMA RESET IRQ 3: Set GLOBAL_RESET (Optional)

field.name: DMA_RESET
field.description:
DMA Reset(1: Reset) - All DMA RX/TX registers are cleared - If DMA RX and TX are in operation, Reset is activated after finishing DMA operation. And it is needed to check IRQ because IRQ is asserted at that time
- When set to 1, it will be cleared automatically

field.name: GLOBAL_RESET
field.description:
SW Reset(1: Reset) All variables are cleared except for SFR
- When set to 1, it will be cleared as 0 automatically

field.name: CORE_START
field.description:
IPRAW Core Start
- When set to 1, it will be cleared automatically

field.name: CORE_BUSY
field.description:
Core Status
It will be set to 1 if CORE_START is set. And, it will be cleared automatically after (TX_PAGE_DONE == 1)

field.name: RX_COLOR_MODE
field.description: RX Color Mode 0 : Y 1 : RGB 2 : YCC

field.name: TX_COLOR_MODE
field.description: TX Color Mode 0 : Y 1 : RGB 2 : YCC

field.name: RX_DPI_MODE
field.description:
DPI Mode 0: RX 600x600 1: RX 600x450 2: Unused 3: RX 600x300 4: RX 300x600 5: RX 300x450 6: Unused 7: RX 300x300
@ RC1 enable , TX is 600x600 only @ RC1 disable , TX DPI is the same as RX DPI.

field.name: RC1_EN
field.description: Resolution Conversion(0: Disable, 1: Enable) Note: fixed to 1

field.name: S1D_EN
field.description: Gamma Correction (0: Disable, 1: Enable)

field.name: SEG1_EN
field.description: SEG1(Edge Extraction) (0: Disable, 1: Enable)

field.name: SCC_EN
field.description: Scan Color Correction (0: Disable, 1: Enable) Note: enable in only RGB 3CH.

field.name: SEG2_EN
field.description: SEG2(Segmentation/Fringe Artifact Removal) (0: Disable, 1: Enable) Note: enable in Y or YCC 3CH.

field.name: ACS_EN
field.description: ACS(0: Disable, 1: Enable) Note: enable in Y or YCC 3CH.

field.name: BLANK_EN
field.description: BLANK (0: Disable, 1: Enable)

field.name: BDS_EN
field.description: BDS (0: Disable, 1: Enable)

field.name: ADAPT_EN
field.description: Adaptation Layer (0: Disable, 1: Enable)

field.name: SMAP_EN
field.description: SMAP (0: Disable, 1: Enable)

field.name: RX_XD
field.description: Image Width (Pixel unit) that is read by DMA RX Image Width before Resolution Conversion It can be set by pixel unit (1 Byte)

field.name: TX_XD
field.description: if (RX_DPI_MODE > or =4) TX_XD = (RX_XD + 127) / 128 * 128; else TX_XD = (RX_XD + 255)/256 * 256;

register.name: SPA_RX_CH0_SVC_CNT_REG
register.description:
RX DMA Service count(CH0)
- Band service count NOT page - DMA RX reads real and dummy data from memory. And, real data will be used and dummy will be thrown out through the image processing. RX Service count includes all sequence that reads real data and dummy

register.name: SPA_RX_CH1_SVC_CNT_REG
register.description:
RX DMA Service count(CH1)
- Band service count NOT page - DMA RX reads real and dummy data from memory. And, real data will be used and dummy will be thrown out through the image processing. RX Service count includes all sequence that reads real data and dummy

register.name: SPA_RX_CH2_SVC_CNT_REG
register.description:
RX DMA Service count(CH2)
- Band service count NOT page - DMA RX reads real and dummy data from memory. And, real data will be used and dummy will be thrown out through the image processing. RX Service count includes all sequence that reads real data and dummy

field.name: ADAPT_OUT_BANDS
field.description:
caution: it is meaningful only if it has 0xff. With 0xff, IRQ will be asserted per page. Other number except for 0xff is related to TX_START
Number of bands transmitted before 'TX_END' (1 band = 1 row of blocks) (If larger than the total number of bands of a page (e.g., 0xFF), 'TX_END' becomes 1 when a page is done)

field.name: BDS_ADDR_INCR

field.description: When setting initial VSC FLAG, INDEX Flag is initiated by VSC Reset Table Memory values

field.name: VSD_K_DEPTH_MIN
field.description: Minimum depth allowed for VS candidate detection(black). The lower the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_TOP_BAND
field.description: Apply VSD_*_DEPTH_***_TOP on selected no. of band margin. (Each band=204 lines)

field.name: VSD_K_DEPTH_MAX_TOP
field.description: Maximum depth allowed at top margin. Intended to be higher than VSD_K_DEPTH_MAX.

field.name: VSD_K_DEPTH_MIN_TOP
field.description: Minimum depth allowed at top margin. Intended to be lower than VSD_K_DEPTH_MIN.

field.name: VSD_K_DEPTH_MAX
field.description: Maximum depth allowed for VS candidate detection(black). The higher the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_K_DEPTH_MID
field.description: Middle depth allowed for VS candidate detection(black). The higher the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_W_DEPTH_MAX
field.description: Maximum depth allowed for VS candidate detection(white). The higher the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_W_DEPTH_MID
field.description: Middle depth allowed for VS candidate detection(white). The higher the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_W_DEPTH_MIN
field.description: Minimum depth allowed for VS candidate detection(white). The lower the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_K_DEPTH_COND
field.description: Condition to select threshold type (MID/MAX). The lower the more possibility of MID. It corresponds to chroma threshold of current pixel. If determined as color, there need lower threshold.(MID)

field.name: VSD_THICKNESS_TH
field.description: Estimate VS thickness by subtracting pixel apart(2~3) from object pixel. (ie. x[n-3] - x[n-2] > THICK_TH ?) The higher the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_W_DEPTH_COND
field.description: Condition to select threshold type (MID/MAX). The lower the more possibility of MID. It corresponds to neighborhood brightness threshold. If determined as bright, there need lower threshold.(MID)

field.name: VSD_W_DEPTH_MAX_TOP
field.description: Maximum depth allowed at top margin. Intended to be higher than VSD_W_DEPTH_MAX.

field.name: VSD_W_DEPTH_MIN_TOP
field.description: Minimum depth allowed at top margin. Intended to be lower than VSD_W_DEPTH_MIN.

field.name: VSD_CHROMA_TH2_TOP
field.description: Threshold at top margin. Intended to be higher than CHROMA_TH2. The higher the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_CHROMA_TH1_TOP
field.description: Threshold at top margin. Intended to be lower than CHROMA_TH1. The lower the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_CHROMA_TH2
field.description: Threshold of current pixel chromaticity. To check if current pixel is color. The higher the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_CHROMA_TH1
field.description: Threshold of neighborhood chromaticity. To check if neighborhood is mono. The lower the more active VS candidate applied.

field.name: VSD_FREQUENCY_TH
field.description: To decide VS by counting no. of real VS candidate within a reference band. (ie. x[n].add > FREQ_TH ?) The lower the more active VS detection applied.

field.name: VSD_CONTINUITY_TH
field.description: To decide VS by counting continuity of VS candidate within a reference band. (ie. x[n].cont > CONT_TH ?) The lower the more active VS detection applied.

register.name: SPA_CIS_SUB_COEF_R_REG
register.description: CIS SUB PIXEL coefficient for R channel

field.name: CIS_SUB_COEF_R2
field.description: R = R1*COEF_R1 + R2*COEF_R2 (sum of coefficients shall be 512)

register.name: SPA_CIS_SUB_COEF_G_REG
register.description: CIS SUB PIXEL coefficient for G channel

field.name: CIS_SUB_COEF_G2
field.description: G = G0 * COEF_G0 + G1 * COEF_G1 + G2 * COEF_G2 ( sum of 3 coefficients shall be 512)

register.name: SPA_CIS_SUB_COEF_B_REG
register.description: CIS SUB PIXEL coefficient for B channel

field.name: CIS_SUB_COEF_B1
field.description: B = B0 * COEF_B0 + B1 * COEF_B1 ( sum of coefficients shall be 512 )
